content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ this pattern is now available for purchase outside the magical stitches 1 course the all cabled up in sunshine crochet sock is meant to be crocheted for a custom fit to your foot this sock can be tried on and adjusted as you go these crochet socks use a fun stitch combination and are worked from toe-up the heel is an afterthought heel where we create an opening for the heel area and come back to work the heel last > magical crochet stitches course - get > the **knit look** with the **crochet hook** ** magical crochet stitches course 2 ** what will the magical stitches course do for you - **go beyond** the split single_crochet stitch - create mock **knit-look cables** in crochet - confidently steek your fabric & block - **transform** fabric to new levels - strategic & intentional increasing & decreasing - enjoy learning **on your own time** - flexible experience maximum magic **check out the magical stitches course here 3 ** **hook ** size 3 5mm & 2 5mm hooks 4 or size to obtain gauge **notions ** removable stitch markers if needed 5 yarn needle to weave in ends 6 scissors 7 **yarn & yardage ** wecrochet stroll fingering weight 8 75% fine superwash merino wool 25% nylon 231 yds/500g colorways in images rainforest heather & wonderland heather mid calf socks 375yds/343m - 2 skeins **abbreviations/stitches ** blo - back loop only chain - chain round- round single_crochet - single_crochet ssc - split single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es **gauge ** 20 sts x 25 row = 4x4 inches in established stitch pattern see notes **skill level ** intermediate **size/measurements ** this sock is meant to be crocheted for a custom fit to your foot this sock can be tried on and adjusted as you go instructions are for adult women s sizes the chart below is for referencing sock lengths for different sizes let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2022 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner 1 https //brianakdesigns com/magicalstitches/ 2 https //brianakdesigns com/magicalstitches/ 3 https //brianakdesigns com/magicalstitches/ 4 https
